data.name: Hero's Quest: Automatic Roguelite RPG
data.detailed_description:
Hero's Quest is an Automatic Roguelite RPG with steady progression. Explore the world and challenge yourself to reach the highest levels within limited energy!

Your goal is to reach the highest level and get as far as you can with a limited number of battles. You'll start every journey with 20 Energy Points (EP). You can earn lots of gold by defeating your enemies and Bosses. Tons of weapons and equipment to choose from and improve your stats.

Features
- Diverse world with multiple enemies and maps
- Roguelite, you'll always get stronger every time you start a new adventure
- Automatic battle
- Skill Tree, tons of Skills to match your play style

data.short_description: Simple RPG game with incremental progress
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core/Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core/Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
